text: Bigū (ej Pajomʙar, in suxanamro ʙaroi mū'minon): «Ej ʙandagoni Man, ki imon ovardaed, az Parvardigoraton ʙitarsed ʙo ançom dodani amrhojaş va dur ʙudan az man'kardaşudahojaş. Baroi onon, ki dar hajoti inçahonī nekī kardaand, podoşi nek ast, ki on çannat ast. Va zamini Alloh vase' ast, pas ʙa on çoe hiçrat kuned, ki dar on Parvardigoratonro iʙodat kuned va ʙitavoned dini xudro ʙarpo dored. Haqiqatan, ʙa saʙrkunandagon muzdaşon purra va ʙehisoʙ doda meşavad!»
